description:
`Plotly`_ is a versatile Python graphing library which lets us make
interactive graphs. In this talk, I will show how to go from a typical
static visualization to one enriched with annotations which will convey
to your audience a more complete interpretation of your visualization.

Here are some sample `plotly visualizations`_ I have made, and in this
talk, I will share how to create them.

.. _Plotly: https://plotly.com/python/
.. _plotly visualizations: https://reshamas.github.io/covid19-plots/
title: Enriching Data Visualizations with Annotations in Plotly
